(3,): As a data administrator, I want to process deletions for a specific date, so that I can maintain data cleanliness and accuracy As a data validator, I want to validate submissions with many flexfields, so that I can ensure data quality before publishing As a data processor, I want to derive PPoPCode and related fields for a record, so that I can enrich the dataset with calculated values As a data analyst, I want to query FABS data with proper indexing, so that I can retrieve records efficiently As a data archivist, I want to load historical data from a specified source and year, so that I can access and analyze past records
